description: Analyzes post-publish performance data to extract one key insight and one actionable suggestion for continuous improvement

key_insight.insight: The post had significantly higher comments than expected, indicating strong audience interest in the topic.
key_insight.supporting_data: Actual comments were 35 vs. expected 25 (40% increase).
key_insight.significance: Higher comment rates suggest the content encourages conversation, an indicator of deeper engagement than passive likes or reach.

actionable_suggestion.suggestion: Prompt explicit questions or calls-to-action to further boost comments.
actionable_suggestion.implementation: Add a direct question at the end of future posts related to trending topics to invite opinions.
actionable_suggestion.expected_impact: This should increase comment rates, foster community, and improve overall post engagement.

result.learning_summary: Comment-driven engagement exceeded expectations; leveraging calls-to-action in future posts can amplify this positive trend.
